name: Whitewater Reinventions
description:
When your business faces rough waters, we work shoulder-to-shoulder with you to steer the right course with speed, security and ambition.

A reinvention, unlike a traditional transformation, is a fundamental, non-reversible new way for organisations to deliver ambitious growth. 

While traditional transformations aim for business evolution, even with this relatively modest ambition, seven out of ten such projects fail. 

At Whitewater, we create lasting change within organisations by using world-class transformation tools plus a set of reinvention practices acquired over long careers and many projects. These allow us to energise and activate the entire organisation, from front-line staff to the boardroom, to rally around bold objectives. 

The Whitewater Reinventions method bucks transformation trends such that many describe them as counterintuitive. And they form our foundational principles for a successful reinvention:

enrichement.description_enriched: Whitewater Reinventions is a company that specializes in business reinvention and transformation. They provide world-class transformation tools and reinvention practices to energize and activate the entire organization, from front-line staff to the boardroom, to rally around ambitious goals. They aim to drive real change for front line staff and customers that goes further, and lasts.
enrichement.description_metadata_raw: Don't transform. Reinvent. Whitewater Reinventions, with a success rate of 92%, co-creates lasting change within organizations. World-class transformation tools plus a set of reinvention practices developed over decades allow us to energize and activate the entire organization, from front-line staff to the boardroom, to rally around ambitious goals. This creates a mindset for growth, the launch pad for repeatable step-change business improvements.

Are you an experienced transformation consultant and entrepreneurial leader?

Have you built a business, led high-stakes transformations, or advised top executives â€” and now seek more purpose-aligned work?

At Whitewater Reinventions, we partner with bold, values-driven leaders to solve deep organisational challenges at the source. 

With a 93% success rate, we do more than consult â€” we co-create reinvention from the inside out.

We are looking for like-minded, global, transformational leaders to join us. Get in contact if you would like to learn more.

#Transformation #Leadership #Future

We are hiring - ex-CEOs and C-suite execs from MNCs who have led major Transformation Projects

Location is immaterial, experience is everything. Also some exposure to delivering deep technological, process and cultural change as a consultant would be a plus

Look us up and please make contact - maybe you have found a new home with highly experienced colleagues who are strong but not ego-centric

When assumptions lead to embarrassment. Several years ago, I ridiculed myself in front of a former high-ranking NATO officer denouncing military leadership and strategy as outdated and unfit as a playbook for the volatile world of modern business. I was wrong â€“ â€˜you donÂ´t know what you donÂ´t knowâ€™. 

Two years and significant experiences later, I had to eat my words. Fortunately, the NATO officer accepted my apology. Thank you.

After significant, Napoleon-led defeats of the Prussian army in the early 19th century, a deep, structural reform was launched. At the heart: 
- Leading with well communicated intent.
- Briefing and back-briefing to retain message integrity through the ranks.
- Decentralized situational leadership and adaptive decision making based on local circumstances.
- Extensively trained frontline staff versatile in all necessary skills.

This improved agility and speed leading to significant advantages in situations that developed in unexpected ways. Even Mike Tyson realized: â€œEverybody has a plan â€“ until they get punched in the face.â€ Do not let a punch in the face throw you off. Reinvent your organisation.
